Key Match Events: Burkina Faso grabbed the lead as soon as the fifth minute through Mohamed Konate
Burkina Faso delivered the final blow in the fourth minute of stoppage time as Bertrand Traore got his name on the scoresheet
Post-Match Reflections: The result sees the Stallions retain top spot in Group L, putting them in pole position to qualify for the next edition of the continental showpiece next year.
The result sees Burundi remain third in the standings, still with only three points, delivering a blow to their chances of qualifying with Senegal four points ahead with a game in hand.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Burkina Faso kept their campaign to qualify for Afcon 2025 on track as they beat Burundi 2-0 in their qualifier at the Felix Houphouet-Boigny Stadium on Sunday evening.
